DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , clinical pilot-study ProEndoTecc Vascular Grafts ( 6 , 7 8 mm Diameter ) superficial femoral artery bypass/interponate . The aim study demonstrate safety implantation , patency durability new type vascular graft .
